name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A unique identifier assigned to this vision prescription.

name: $addidentifier
desc: A unique identifier assigned to this vision prescription.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this vision prescription.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the resource instance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

name: $created
desc: Returns: The date this resource was created.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date this resource was created.

name: $patient
desc: Returns: A resource reference to the person to whom the vision prescription applies.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A resource reference to the person to whom the vision prescription applies.

name: $encounter
desc: Returns: A reference to a resource that identifies the particular occurrence of contact between patient and health care provider during which the prescription was issued.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to a resource that identifies the particular occurrence of contact between patient and health care provider during which the prescription was issued.

name: $dateWritten
desc: Returns: The date (and perhaps time) when the prescription was written.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date (and perhaps time) when the prescription was written.

name: $prescriber
desc: Returns: The healthcare professional responsible for authorizing the prescription.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The healthcare professional responsible for authorizing the prescription.

name: $lensSpecification
desc: Returns: Contain the details of  the individual lens specifications and serves as the authorization for the fullfillment by certified professionals.

name: $addlensSpecification
desc: Contain the details of  the individual lens specifications and serves as the authorization for the fullfillment by certified professionals.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contain the details of  the individual lens specifications and serves as the authorization for the fullfillment by certified professionals.
